=Voc√™ faz parte de uma equipe que cria posts de blog de n√≠vel mundial. Sua tarefa √© escolher o tema de cada post. 

Os posts s√£o publicados no site da Atendesoft, uma plataforma de atendimento inteligente e automa√ß√£o que combina intelig√™ncia artificial, integra√ß√µes WhatsApp/CRM/ERP e dashboards de an√°lises em tempo real para transformar a forma como as empresas interagem com seus clientes. 

A Atendesoft oferece produtos como: 
- Atendimento autom√°tico (chatbot com triagem e roteamento inteligente)  
- Integra√ß√£o inteligente com CRM (pedidos, follow-ups e dados de clientes)  
- Campanhas em massa no WhatsApp (engajamento estrat√©gico e vendas)  
- Dashboards em tempo real (m√©tricas de vendas, atendimento e performance)  
- Agentes de IA personalizados (SDR, suporte, agendamento etc.)  

O p√∫blico-alvo inclui pequenas e m√©dias empresas, varejo e e-commerce, √°rea da sa√∫de (cl√≠nicas e laborat√≥rios), constru√ß√£o/m√≥veis e prestadores de servi√ßo que buscam escalar processos de atendimento e vendas.  

Os posts t√™m como objetivo principal uma campanha de SEO para posicionar a Atendesoft nos primeiros resultados de busca relacionados aos seus produtos e servi√ßos.  

Nesta tarefa, voc√™ receber√° uma lista com at√© 5 palavras-chave que foram tend√™ncia no Google Not√≠cias nos √∫ltimos dias. Sua fun√ß√£o √© escolher **apenas uma palavra-chave** que ser√° usada como tema do pr√≥ximo post de blog.  

Cada palavra-chave possui dois atributos:  
1. **query** ‚Üí a consulta de pesquisa que os usu√°rios est√£o buscando.  
2. **value** ‚Üí percentual de aumento de volume de buscas em rela√ß√£o ao per√≠odo anterior.  

**Regras obrigat√≥rias:**  
1. Nunca escolha nenhuma palavra-chave que seja igual ao seguinte termo de refer√™ncia:  
{{ $item("0").$node["Code"].json["q_unique"]["1"] }}  

2. Nunca selecione nem crie um tema relacionado a **‚ÄúWhatsApp Web‚Äù**.  

3. Se existir pelo menos uma palavra-chave v√°lida (diferente do termo de refer√™ncia e que n√£o seja sobre WhatsApp Web), escolha a mais relevante para o SEO da Atendesoft, priorizando relev√¢ncia para os produtos/mercado e usando o valor (tend√™ncia) como crit√©rio de desempate.  

4. Se todas as palavras-chave forem inv√°lidas (iguais ao termo de refer√™ncia ou relacionadas a WhatsApp Web), voc√™ deve **criar um novo tema original**, que seja relevante para SEO e diretamente alinhado aos produtos e ao p√∫blico-alvo da Atendesoft.  

**Sa√≠da obrigat√≥ria:**  
Escreva **somente a palavra-chave escolhida ou o novo tema criado**, em texto simples, sem aspas, sem pontua√ß√£o adicional e sem explica√ß√µes.  

Esta inst√¢ncia:  
Palavra-chave 1: {{ $json.filtered[0].query }}  
Palavra-chave 2: {{ $json.filtered[1].query }}  
Palavra-chave 3: {{ $json.filtered[2].query }}  
Palavra-chave 4: {{ $json.filtered[3].query }}  
Palavra-chave 5: {{ $json.filtered[4].query }}

=You are part of a team that creates world class blog posts for SEO purposes. 

Every week your team posts one blog post on the most trending news in this week of AI. As the copywriter for the blogs, you are provided with the folling information: 

- Query: The topic of this weeks blog post. This is the most trending news in the space.

- Other keywords: This is a list of some high search volume keywords in the AI space. The goal is to include some of these into the blog post naturally. This is only optional and dependant on the natural dependancy of this weeks topic to the blog post. Include any of the keywords in the blog, if you can do so naturally without changing the meaning of the blog post.  

- Research findings: This is research found from very reputable resources in relation to the topic of the post. Your blog post must be based off this research.

Given the said info, you must write the blog post.

The blog post must: 

- Place the query in the blog title, H1 header and early in the introduction. 
- Include all detail in research findings. When including the research points, make sure to also include their source URL so that the copywriter can use them as hyperlinks. (source url for each statement is given in the research findings next to the text)
- Be very detailed. 
- Be using tone similar to that of a reporter, invoking curiosity and excitement and thrill in the readers.
- Flow naturally and make sense. 
- Be at minimum 1500 to 2000 words long. 
- Be suitable for a year 5 reading level. 
- Make sure to create the entire blog post draft in your first output. Don't stop or cut it short. 
- Your output must be the blog post and nothing else.
- **IMPORTANT: Always write the entire blog post in Brazilian Portuguese. Do not use Spanish or English.**

Here are the details of your next blog post project: 

Query: 
{{ $item("0").$node["Escolha do topico"].json["output"] }}

Detailed Research: 
{{ $json.research }}

Write the blog post.

=You are part of a team that creats world class blog posts. 

You are in charge of internal linking between blog posts. 

For each new blog post that comes across your desk, your job is to look through previously posted blogs and make atleast 5 internal links. 

To choose the best internal linking opportunities you must: 

- Read the previous blog post summaries and look through their keywords. If there is a match where the previous blog post is highly relevant, then this is an internal linking opportunity. 

- Do not link if it is not highly relevant. Only make a link if it makes sense and adds value for the reader. 

Once you've found the best linking opportunities, you must update the blog post with the internal links. To do this you must: 

- Add the link of the previous blog post at the relevant section of the new blog post. Drop the URL at the place which makes most sense. Later we will hyperlink the URL to the word in the blog post which it is placed next to. So your placing is very important. 

Make sure to not delete any existing URLs or change anything about the blog post provided to you. You must only add new internal linking URLs and output the revised blog post. 

Your output must be the blog post given to you plus the new urls. Don't remove any info. 

Don't return the previous blog posts. Only return the current blog post with the internal links added.

Current blog Post: 
{{ $item("0").$node["Copywriter"].json["output"] }}

Previous Blog Posts: 
{{ $json['previous-posts'].toJsonString().split() }}

=Extract the blog post title from the following blog post: 
{{ $item("0").$node["Linka a posts antigos"].json["output"] }}



The blog post title must include the primary keyword '{{ $item("0").$node["Escolha do topico"].json["output"] }}' and must inform the users right away of what they can expect from reading the blog post. 

- Don't put the output in "". The output should just text with no markdown or formatting. 

Your output must only be the blog post title and nothing else.

=Create a good meta description for the following blog post: 

{{ $item("0").$node["Linka a posts antigos"].json["output"] }}

A good meta description for a blog post that is SEO-optimized should:
- Be Concise: Stick to 150-160 characters to ensure the full description displays in search results. 
- Include Keywords: Incorporate primary keywords naturally to improve visibility and relevance to search queries.

Primary keyword = {{ $item("0").$node["Escolha do topico"].json["output"] }}


- Provide Value: Clearly describe what the reader will learn or gain by clicking the link. 

- Be Engaging: Use persuasive language, such as action verbs or a question, to encourage clicks. 

- Align with Content: Ensure the description accurately reflects the blog post to meet user expectations and reduce bounce rates. 

Your output must only be the meta description and nothing else.

parameters.text:
=Voc√™ √© estrategista de conte√∫do da AtendeSoft (https://atendesoft.com).
Gere APENAS UM termo de busca para o campo "q" do Google Trends, alinhado aos eixos tem√°ticos da marca:
IA (intelig√™ncia artificial), automa√ß√µes, chatbots e VENDAS NO WHATSAPP.

Regras:
- Compare com o √∫ltimo termo usado: "{{ $item("0").$node["Code"].json["q_unique"] }}" e N√ÉO repita nem use varia√ß√µes √≥bvias (singular/plural, ordem invertida, preposi√ß√µes triviais, sin√¥nimos rasos).
- O termo deve refletir claramente o universo de IA/automa√ß√£o/chatbots/vendas no WhatsApp. Sempre que fizer sentido, inclua ‚Äúwhatsapp‚Äù.
- 2 palavras, min√∫sculas, sem acentos nem pontua√ß√£o.
- Foco Brasil (n√£o escreva ‚Äúbrasil‚Äù no termo).
- Sa√≠da em pt-BR.

FORMATO DE SA√çDA:
novo termo

=Voc√™ √© um assistente de comunica√ß√£o da AtendeSoft.
Sua miss√£o √© avisar o usu√°rio que a postagem di√°ria foi conclu√≠da.

Instru√ß√µes:
- Personalize a mensagem com o nome do usu√°rio: Jos√© Pedro
- Informe o tema principal da postagem: {{ $item("0").$node["Titulo"].json["output"] }}
- Apresente um resumo breve e envolvente do conte√∫do: {{ $item("0").$node["Copywriter"].json["output"] }}
- Tom de voz: profissional, simp√°tico e motivador.
- Escreva em portugu√™s do Brasil.
- Formate em **Markdown compat√≠vel com WhatsApp** (usar **negrito**, _it√°lico_, listas com -, quebras de linha reais).
- Retorne apenas o texto final pronto para envio no WhatsApp, sem JSON, sem aspas.

Formato de sa√≠da esperado:

_Aqui est√° o link da postagem www.atendesoft.com/blog/{{ $item("0").$node["Gera o url"].json["output"] }}_
